biocontainers.name: detonate
biocontainers.summary: Detonate (de novo transcriptome rna-seq assembly with or without the truth evaluation) consists of two component packages, rsem-eval and ref-eval.

biotools.summary: DETONATE consists of two component packages, RSEM-EVAL and REF-EVAL. Both packages are mainly intended to be used to evaluate de novo transcriptome assemblies, although REF-EVAL can be used to compare sets of any kinds of genomic sequences.

bioschemas.name: DETONATE
bioschemas.summary: DETONATE consists of two component packages, RSEM-EVAL and REF-EVAL. Both packages are mainly intended to be used to evaluate de novo transcriptome assemblies, although REF-EVAL can be used to compare sets of any kinds of genomic sequences.
